title: CodeWP - AI For WordPress Creatorssearchstarclosedownloadchevron-leftcross
introduction: CodeWP is a platform that offers AI-powered tools for faster WordPress development, including conversational coding, expert AI help, security scanning, and troubleshooting. It allows users to generate code snippets and complete plugins through simple prompts and offers specialized AI modes trained on the latest plugin code examples and documentation.
features: Conversational coding for complex snippets and plugins
Support for PHP, JS, CSS, and SQL
Proprietary AI for secure and modern code output
Built-in testing suite for WordPress instances
AI expert chat for instant answers
Connect projects to chat for assistance
AI troubleshooting and security features (coming soon)
pricing: Free plan with limited features and a Pro plan for $18/month billed annually with additional features and support

faqs.question: What are 'platform actions'?
faqs.answer: Platform actions are spent every time you interact with the platform AI, such as generating code, editing, explaining, or sending chat messages.

faqs.question: Can I try before I buy?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free plan available to try out the platform with limited features.

faqs.question: Can I change plans after purchasing?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can change plans after purchasing to access more features and support.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: Secure payment methods are accepted, and you can cancel anytime.
